title: Swim and Aquatics Internship
Description:: The Swim and Aquatics Internship is available to graduates with a bachelor's degree.  You must have have a working knowledge of the HyTek Systems (Team Manager and Meet Manager), a background in collegiate swimming, and will have swim camp or age group coaching experience.  As an intern, you will assist the head coach in recruitment of student-athletes in accordance with college policy, meet coaching, conduct practices, organize team travel, monitor student-athletes' academic and social progress, equipment maintenance and purchases, fund-raising and administrative duties required to develop a competitive swimming program.

title: Presidential Scholarship - Union College
Description:: The Presidential Scholarship is available to incoming students at Union College, Nebraska.  You must have a minimum 3.75 GPA and a minimum 29 ACT / 1940 SAT score to be eligible for this award.

title: Academic Excellence Scholarship - Union College
Description:: The Academic Excellence Scholarship is available to incoming students at Union College, Nebraska.  You must have a minimum 3.5 GPA and a minimum 27 ACT / 1820 SAT score to be eligible for this award.

title: Academic Honors Scholarship - Union College
Description:: The Academic Honors Scholarship is available to incoming students at Union College, Nebraska.  You must have a minimum 3.25 GPA and a minimum 23 ACT / 1590 SAT score to be eligible for this award.

title: Academic Merit Scholarship - Union College
Description:: The Academic Merit Scholarship is available to incoming students at Union College, Nebraska.  You must have a minimum 3.0 GPA and a minimum 20 ACT / 1410 SAT score to be eligible for this award.

title: College Achievement Scholarship - Union College
Description:: The College Achievement Scholarship is available to incoming students at Union College, Nebraska.  You must meet the admission criteria to be eligible for this award.

title: UCLA Achievement Scholarship
Description:: The UCLA Achievement Scholarship is available to entering freshmen at the University of California, Los Angeles.  You must have been designated by the Undergraduate Admissions office as a top ranked academic admit, and demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: UCLA Regents Scholarship
Description:: The UCLA Regents Scholarship is available to entering freshmen and transfer students at the University of California, Los Angeles.  You must demonstrate academic excellence, leadership, and exceptional promise to be eligible for this award.

title: UCLA Chancellor's Blue and Gold Scholarship Program
Description:: The UCLA Chancellor's Blue and Gold Scholarship Program is available to entering freshmen and transfer students at the University of California, Los Angeles.  You must be graduating from a Los Angeles County High School that traditionally has sent few students to UCLA, or be transferring from a community college in the greater Los Angeles area to be eligible for this award.

title: Henri de Castries Scholarship
Description:: The Henri de Castries Scholarship is available to American and French nationals who are enrolled in Science Po's dual BA program with Columbia or Berkeley University.  You must submit a personal statement describing your academic interest in and motivations for attending the dual Franco-American program in order to be considered for this award.

title: Jim Roberts Scholarship
Description:: The Jim Roberts Scholarship is available to students currently enrolled in an environmental studies program.  You must submit a personal essay that reflects your education and experience in support of ethical work on environmental problems in order to be considered for this award.

title: E. Kettner Gadebusch, Class of 1927, Scholarship
Description:: The E. Kettner Gadebusch, Class of 1927, Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: James Wilson Gailey, Class of 1917, War Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The James Wilson Gailey, Class of 1917, War Memorial Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: Gaither Family Scholarship
Description:: The Gaither Family Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: Seaton Gales Memorial Fund Scholarship
Description:: The Seaton Gales Memorial Fund Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: Richard and Susan Galloway ’54 Scholarship
Description:: The Richard and Susan Galloway ’54 Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: Jeannette McFarlane Galt Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Jeannette McFarlane Galt Memorial Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: David G. Gamble, Class of 1937, Scholarship
Description:: The David G. Gamble, Class of 1937, Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: Henry S. Gansevoort Scholarship
Description:: The Henry S. Gansevoort Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: James Garretson Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The James Garretson Memorial Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: Catherine H. Beattie Fellowship
Description:: The Catherine H. Beattie Fellowship is available to graduate students in horticulture, biology and related fields who are conducting research.  Preference is given to students whose projects focus on the endangered flora of the Carolinas and the southeastern United States.

title: NASCAR Diversity Scholarship
Description:: The NASCAR Diversity Scholarship is open to students between the ages of 18 and 25.  You must submit a 90 second video that demonstrates one technology used in NASCAR, an issue it resolved and how STEM professionals designed it in order to be considered for this award.

Provided By:: University of Mississippi, School of Business Administration
title: John Reed Holley Scholarship
Description:: The John Reed Holley Scholarship is available to students at the University of Mississippi.  You must be majoring in business administration or accountancy to be eligible for this award.

title: $5,000 Easy Scholarship: Collect 1 Piece of Sports Gear for Kids in Underserved Communities!
Description:: You could win a $5,000 scholarship just by collecting 1 piece of gently-used sports gear to kids in underserved communities. Look in your closet or garage for 1 ball, bat, glove, stick, or any other gear. Then donate your item to a local community center (we’ll give you the address of the closest one!). You'll be helping kids play more sports, which improves their well-being, AND you'll automatically enter to win a $5,000 scholarship!

title: Walt Risler Scholarship
Description:: The Walt Risler Scholarship is open to criminal justice majors at IU South Bend.  You must have a minimum 3.0 GPA in criminal justice core courses, have completed at least 40 credit hours, and submit an essay to be considered for this award.

title: Shugart Grant
Description:: The Shugart Grant is open to students at Indiana Wesleyan University.  You must demonstrate financial need and be a resident of Indiana to be considered for this award.
